eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
%
L_{0} &=& \alpha' k^2 + L_{0}^{\rm osc} \\
&=& \alpha' k^2 + N + L^{K}_{0} + a^0 + a^{\rm g},
\label{eq:Hamiltonian}
%
\

\begin{eqnarray}
%
{\cal H} &=& \{ \phi \in {\cal H}_{\rm total}: b_{0} \phi = 0 \}, \\
\hat{\cal H} &=& {\cal H}^{L_0} 
	= \{ \phi \in {\cal H}_{\rm total}: b_{0} \phi = L_0 \phi = 0 \}.
%
\

\begin{eqnarray}
%
{\cal H} &=& \{ \phi \in {\cal H}_{\rm total}: 
	b_{0} \phi = \beta_{0} \phi = 0 \}, \\
\hat{\cal H} &=& {\cal H}^{L_0, G_0} 
	= \{ \phi \in {\cal H}_{\rm total}: 
	b_{0} \phi = \beta_{0} \phi = L_0 \phi = G_0 \phi = 0 \}.
%
\

\begin{eqnarray}
%
L^{0}_{-m} &=& \sqrt{2\alpha'} k_0 \alpha^{0}_{-m} + \cdots, 
\quad (m \neq 0) \\
G^{0}_{-r} &=& \sqrt{2\alpha'} k_0 \psi^{0}_{-r} + \cdots,

\begin{eqnarray}

b &=& N^{b} + N^{\beta}, \\
c &=& N^{c} + N^{\gamma}.
%
\

\begin{eqnarray}
%
&& Q^{\rm (FGZ)}_{0}: {\cal H}^n \rightarrow {\cal H}^{n+1}, \\
&& d': {\cal F}_{``\hat{c}^0=1"}^{n} \rightarrow {\cal F}_{``\hat{c}^0=1"}^{n+1}, 
\\
&& d'': {\cal F}^{n}(c_{-m}, \gamma_{-r}) 
\rightarrow 
{\cal F}^{n+1}(c_{-m}, \gamma_{-r}),
%
\

\begin{eqnarray}
%
\phi^n &=& \sum_{b \geq -n>0} \phi_1^{-b} \phi_2^{n+b}
\nonumber \\
&=& \sum  d' \chi_1^{-b-1} \phi_2^{n+b}.
%
\

\begin{eqnarray}
%
\phi _1 \phi_2
&=& (d' \chi_1) \phi_2
\nonumber \\
&=& (d' \chi_1) \phi_2 + (-)^{b+1} \chi_1 d'' \phi_2
\nonumber \\ 
&=& Q^{\rm (FGZ)}_{0} (\chi_1 \phi_2) \quad\mbox{for $n<0$}.
\label{eq:kunneth2}
%
\

\begin{eqnarray}
%
